items.text: A little ways to the side of the school grounds, a group of students (punks) are talking. A girl is watching them from a bush.

items.speaker: Punk
items.text: Man, that fucking teacher pisses me off.

items.speaker: Other Punk
items.text: Yeah, who cares about history anyway? Shit's lame.

items.speaker: Mean-Looking Student
items.text: Man, I wish I had a smoke with me right now...
Camera slightly pans to Kaori, hidden in the bush. All characters still in frame though.

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: But smoking isn't allowed on school grounds...

items.speaker: Other Punk
items.text: Just go see the usual guy, he's got some.

items.speaker: Mean-Looking Student
items.text: Man, I would but I already used the money that freak otaku "gave" me on... Other goods.

items.speaker: Punk
items.text: Oh man, you actually got it!?

items.speaker: Other Punk
items.text: Dude, let's go!
Three punks run off screen. The camera pans back towards Kaori fully and she "backs out" of the bush.

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: What did they...
Kaori turns around and sees MC.

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: Oh!

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Sorry.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: What are you doing?

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: Ah...

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: It's no trouble, you just surprised me.

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: Umm...

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: I... I wasn't spying or anything! I just...

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: Well...

items.speaker: MC
items.text: It's fine, I saw nothing.

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: No, you're right. I'm at fault here.

items.speaker: Narrator
items.text: The girl seems relieved.

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: They're a group of delinquents that often skip class to smoke.

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: That's against the rules, so I followed them to see if I could convince them to stop.

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: In the end, I was too afraid to do anything though...

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: I'll be going now.

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: My name's Kaori Nakano by the way.

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: Bye!

items.speaker: MC
items.text: That looks like spying to me.

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: Umm... I just...

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: Oh, fine! But it's not what you think!

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: I'm just worried about them!

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: No, that doesn't sound right...

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: Look, I'm sorry. Please don't tell anyone!
You can walk up to and talk to Kaori somewhere on the map. She just turns around towards you.

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: Hmm...?

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: Oh! You're the one from that time!

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Who are you?

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Hi.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Hey, you're that stalker.

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: H-Hey, could you not say it like that?

items.speaker: Kaori Nakano
items.text: I already told you what happened...
